comment: He's hella chill and understanding. Will help you if you need it. By no means strict with the coursework unless he has to follow the syllabus rules given by the lab coordinator. Personally, I found the content he taught (biol 1107 lab) to be simple and not difficult. Would highly recommend taking his class.

I took Paul Clark for bio lab and he was a great teacher. easy grader, helps you out, makes you feel comfortable to ask questions. after a stressful semester, I was really thankful to have a teacher like him that didn't make me seem like a burden compared to other teachers I've had. he literally does all he can to help his students out.
He is a great person and wants you to pass. He has been my favorite professor ��
He was really chill and cared more that we tried our best in lab. He really wants to see effort and he's very understanding. Wish I could have him for all my labs tbh.
Paul was super helpful and chill in lab. He clearly explained everything to do and if you needed help he explained the material very well

Extremely tough grader but he is very nice. I barely made an A but I literally was way to stressed about this class. It was probably the curriculum that i hated the most but thats not Pauls fault. It was really boring and nothing really engaging about it. Nice guy but will dock you points for dumb stuff.
Great lab professor, truly cares about us doing good in the class, makes everything easy to understand, would 100% take him again!!
He's a great professor! He's very relatable and makes coming to class fun.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Skip class? You won't pass.--Hilarious

comment: Potentially the best professor I've ever had at any level of academia.
